name: Bloody Chainsaw
description:
"Bloody Chainsaw" is an escape-style game where you have to perform various tasks to get an ending.

The game contains 3 possible endings.

SYNOPSIS:

Mark and Sara are traveling by car for the weekend. After stopping at a gas station to use the restroom, Sara and Mark are surprised by a cannibalistic killer using a chainsaw.

Now Mark will have to escape captivity before he becomes the killer's dinner.

CHARACTERISTICS:

Camera: First person.

Gameplay: Escape style.

Endings: The game contains 3 endings.

Graphics: PS1 style, but other camera types are available.

Duration: The game is short, but it can become very time consuming for a first playthrough.

NOTE: The game is difficult and violent.
